about_the_game:
Save money on this game’s content by purchasing the Season Pass.

The Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Season Pass gives you access to brand new Content Packs, featuring over 2,000 new questions on a variety of interesting topics.

Season Pass holders will automatically get access to the 12 new DLCs planned for 2023–2024, covering themes such as video games, cinema, space exploration, US sports... and many more!

So, is that your final answer?
